title: TESTING
fullText:
The testing of the installation shall be performed in accordance with the requirements of the manufacturer of the pre-assembled battery system and other components of the BESS and the requirements of AS/NZS 3000:2018 Section 8.
Battery system polarity shall be tested prior to connection to a PCE. Testing shall be carried out to ensure no inadvertent connections between floating or isolated battery systems and earth.
The following measurements should be undertaken and results recorded in the commissioning documentation:
(a) Total battery system voltage.
(b) Individual pre-assembled battery system voltages, if applicable.
(c) Overall battery system voltage drop from cabling at maximum rated discharge current.
